creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text: saving a document with neutron does not seem to work.

I can confirm this. There's no error message, but the changes aren't applied to
the document.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
Yulup sends a PUT request:

PUT /default/authoring/index.xml?lenya.module=neutron&lenya.step=checkin HTTP/1.1

creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
i think it's a bug in the neutron module which appeared after the change to uuid.
see also the mailthread SourceWritingTransformer and lenya:// protocol from
2006-10-11 18:12
I'm trying to fix it and migrate it to the usecase framework.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
Saving should work now.

There's a problem, though - when a validation error occurs, it just says
"Document could not be saved". This will hopefully not occur anymore when
client-side validation is available.
creator: andreas@apache.org
